attributes.action: Limit Personal and Corporate Wealth to Boost Economy
attributes.additional_details:
We propose that personal wealth of UK Citizens be limited with a 500 Million cap not including shares in UK industrial companies and charitable contributions. Financial, property, non-profit, and service companies to be specifically excluded. (richest UK individual currently 13,300m, Branson et al about 3500m).

Further to encourage a proper market situation we propose a market cap limit on any individual UK company of 7000m. This will mean more smaller companies, more competition and more innovation.
